name: Night Monsters
description:
A scary little game about a little girl and her big fears that have materialized into real monsters. Locked in a house, surrounded by monsters and a bunch of keys that can open the door to the next floor, all this surrounds her in her world of nightmares and horrors.

Night Monsters - A top down view game with Horror elements, where the player, running away from monsters around, collects keys scattered around the room, with a limited view from a burning candle, which after a while will surely go out.

Features of the game:
- Horror
- Nice Visual Style
- Atmospheric Music
